<title level="1" pfs="">[Xevalorg](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1564)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 41

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 13">[Xevalorg](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1564)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 14</row>

**Perception** +26; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +23, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +27, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +26, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +23, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +24

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +4

**Con** +5

**Int** +2

**Wis** +7

**Cha** +4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 34 

**Fort** +26 

**Ref** +20 

**Will** +23 

</row>

**HP** 235

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +27 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d12+14 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +27 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d8+14 slashing

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 33, attack +27
- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164)
- **3rd**
[Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)
- **4th**
[Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86), [Shape Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=276) (×3)
- **5th**
[Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23), [Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=365)
- **6th**
[Flesh to Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=123)
- **Constant (4th)**
[Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271)

**Furious Claws** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Xevalorg makes up to four claw Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward Xevalorg's multiple attack penalty, and the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after he makes all his attacks.

**Eerie Flexibility**   Despite his size, Xevalorg's multiple joints allow him to fit through tight spaces as if he were a Medium creature. While [Squeezing](/Actions.aspx?ID=31), he can move at his full Speed.

**[Rend](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=30)** <actions string="Single Action" />  claw

</column>
name: Xevalorg
